report.title: Species & Occurrence Counts for user
report.description: Gives a total number of species and occurrences recorded by a user identified by their warehouse user ID.
report.query: SELECT cast(date_part('year', o.date_start) as character varying) as year, count(DISTINCT o.taxon_meaning_id) as species_count, count(DISTINCT o.id) as occurrences_count FROM cache_occurrences_functional o WHERE o.website_id=8 AND o.zero_abundance='f' AND (trim('#date_from#')='' OR '#date_from#'='Click here' OR o.date_end >= CAST(COALESCE('#date_from#','1500-01-01') as date)) AND (trim('#date_to#')='' OR '#date_to#'='Click here' OR o.date_start <= CAST(COALESCE('#date_to#','1500-01-01') as date)) AND o.date_start is not null AND (trim('#site_name#')='' OR o.location_name ilike '%#site_name#%') AND (CAST(o.taxon_group_id AS character varying)='#taxon_group_id#' OR '#taxon_group_id#'='') AND o.created_by_id=#user_id# AND o.record_status<>'R' GROUP BY year, website_id UNION SELECT 'Total' as year, count(DISTINCT o.taxon_meaning_id) as species_count, count(DISTINCT o.id) as occurrences_count FROM cache_occurrences_functional o WHERE o.website_id=8 AND o.zero_abundance='f' AND (trim('#date_from#')='' OR '#date_from#'='Click here' OR o.date_end >= CAST(COALESCE('#date_from#','1500-01-01') as date)) AND (trim('#date_to#')='' OR '#date_to#'='Click here' OR o.date_start <= CAST(COALESCE('#date_to#','1500-01-01') as date)) AND o.date_start is not null AND (trim('#site_name#')='' OR o.location_name ilike '%#site_name#%') AND (CAST(o.taxon_group_id AS character varying)='#taxon_group_id#' OR '#taxon_group_id#'='') AND o.created_by_id=#user_id#
